prompt:
Genereer 1 user story voor een BMAD frontend dashboard feature.
        Geef het antwoord in JSON format:
        {
            "title": "Dashboard Title",
            "as_a": "user role",
            "i_want": "desired functionality",
            "so_that": "benefit",
            "acceptance_criteria": "list of criteria"
        }
answer:
```json
{
    "title": "User Activity Overview",
    "as_a": "BMAD frontend user",
    "i_want": "to see a visual representation of user activity over the past month",
    "so_that": "I can easily identify trends and patterns in user engagement",
    "acceptance_criteria": [
        "The dashboard displays a graph showing daily user logins for the past 30 days.",
        "The graph includes tooltips that provide exact numbers when hovering over data points.",
        "There are filters to view activity by different user segments (e.g., new users, returning users).",
        "The dashboard updates in real-time as new user activity data is received.",
        "The layout is responsive and works well on both desktop and mobile devices."
    ]
}
```
